00047 typedef l4_uint32_t Elf32_Addr;   
00048 typedef l4_uint32_t Elf32_Off;    
00049 typedef l4_uint16_t Elf32_Half;   
00050 typedef l4_uint32_t Elf32_Word;   
00051 typedef l4_int32_t  Elf32_Sword;  
00052 typedef l4_uint64_t Elf64_Addr;   
00053 typedef l4_uint64_t Elf64_Off;    
00054 typedef l4_uint16_t Elf64_Half;   
00055 typedef l4_uint32_t Elf64_Word;   
00056 typedef l4_int32_t  Elf64_Sword;  
00057 typedef l4_uint64_t Elf64_Xword;  
00058 typedef l4_int64_t  Elf64_Sxword;

00066 #define ElfW(type)      _ElfW(Elf, 64, type)
00067 #else
00068 #define ElfW(type)      _ElfW(Elf, 32, type)
00069 #endif
00070 #define _ElfW(e,w,t)    __ElfW(e, w, _##t)
00071 #define __ElfW(e,w,t)   e##w##t

00073 #ifdef ARCH_x86

00075 #define L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE    EM_386
00076 #define L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS     ELFCLASS32
00077 #else
00078 #ifdef ARCH_amd64
00079 #define L4_ARCH_EI_DATA      ELFDATA2LSB
00080 #define L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE    EM_AMD64
00081 #define L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS     ELFCLASS64
00082 #else
00083 #ifdef ARCH_arm
00084 #define L4_ARCH_EI_DATA      ELFDATA2LSB
00085 #define L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE    EM_ARM
00086 #define L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS     ELFCLASS32
00087 #else
00088 #ifdef ARCH_ppc32
00089 #define L4_ARCH_EI_DATA      ELFDATA2MSB
00090 #define L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE    EM_PPC
00091 #define L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS     ELFCLASS32
00092 #else
00093 #ifdef ARCH_sparc
00094 #define L4_ARCH_EI_DATA      ELFDATA2LSB
00095 #define L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE    EM_SPARC
00096 #define L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS     ELFCLASS32
00097 #else
00098 #warning elf.h: Unsupported build architecture!
00099 #endif
00100 #endif
00101 #endif
00102 #endif
00103 #endif

00114 #define EI_NIDENT 16      
00118 typedef struct {
00119     unsigned char e_ident[EI_NIDENT];
00120     Elf32_Half    e_type;   
00121     Elf32_Half    e_machine;  
00122     Elf32_Word    e_version;  
00123     Elf32_Addr    e_entry;  
00124     Elf32_Off   e_phoff;  
00125     Elf32_Off   e_shoff;  
00126     Elf32_Word    e_flags;  
00127     Elf32_Half    e_ehsize; 
00128     Elf32_Half    e_phentsize;  
00129     Elf32_Half    e_phnum;  
00130     Elf32_Half    e_shentsize;  
00131     Elf32_Half    e_shnum;  
00132     Elf32_Half    e_shstrndx; 
00133 } Elf32_Ehdr;

00413 #define PT_HIOS   0x6fffffff

00415 #define PT_HIPROC 0x7fffffff 
00417 #define PT_GNU_EH_FRAME (PT_LOOS + 0x474e550) 
00418 #define PT_GNU_STACK    (PT_LOOS + 0x474e551) 
00419 #define PT_GNU_RELRO    (PT_LOOS + 0x474e552)

00422 #define PT_L4_KIP       (PT_LOOS + 0x13) 
00423 #define PT_L4_AUX       (PT_LOOS + 0x14)

00456 /* Dynamic structure - figure 2-9, page 2-12 */
00457 
00459 typedef struct {
00460     Elf32_Sword   d_tag;  
00461     union {
00462   Elf32_Word  d_val;  
00463   Elf32_Addr  d_ptr;  
00464     } d_un;
00465 } Elf32_Dyn;
00466 
00468 typedef struct {
00469     Elf64_Sxword  d_tag;  
00470     union {
00471   Elf64_Xword d_val;  
00472   Elf64_Addr  d_ptr;  
00473     } d_un;
00474 } Elf64_Dyn;

00478 #define DT_NULL   0 
00479 #define DT_NEEDED 1 
00480 #define DT_PLTRELSZ 2 
00481 #define DT_PLTGOT 3 
00482 #define DT_HASH   4 
00483 #define DT_STRTAB 5 
00484 #define DT_SYMTAB 6 
00485 #define DT_RELA   7 
00486 #define DT_RELASZ 8 
00487 #define DT_RELAENT  9 
00488 #define DT_STRSZ  10  
00489 #define DT_SYMENT 11  
00490 #define DT_INIT   12  
00491 #define DT_FINI   13  
00492 #define DT_SONAME 14  
00493 #define DT_RPATH  15  
00494 #define DT_SYMBOLIC 16  
00495 #define DT_REL    17  
00496 #define DT_RELSZ  18  
00497 #define DT_RELENT 19  
00498 #define DT_PTRREL 20  
00499 #define DT_DEBUG  21  
00500 #define DT_TEXTREL  22  
00501 #define DT_JMPREL 23  
00502 #define DT_BIND_NOW 24  
00503 #define DT_INIT_ARRAY 25  
00504 #define DT_FINI_ARRAY 26  
00505 #define DT_INIT_ARRAYSZ 27  
00506 #define DT_FINI_ARRAYSZ 28  
00507 #define DT_RUNPATH  29  
00508 #define DT_FLAGS  30  
00509 #define DT_ENCODING 32  
00510 #define DT_PREINIT_ARRAY 32 
00511 #define DT_PREINIT_ARRAYSZ 33 
00512 #define DT_NUM    34  
00513 #define DT_LOOS   0x6000000d 
00514 #define DT_HIOS   0x6ffff000 
00515 #define DT_LOPROC 0x70000000 
00516 #define DT_HIPROC 0x7fffffff 
00518 /* Values of `d_un.d_val' in the DT_FLAGS entry.  */
00519 #define DF_ORIGIN 0x00000001  
00520 #define DF_SYMBOLIC 0x00000002  
00521 #define DF_TEXTREL  0x00000004  
00522 #define DF_BIND_NOW 0x00000008  
00523 #define DF_STATIC_TLS 0x00000010  
00525 /* State flags selectable in the `d_un.d_val' element of the DT_FLAGS_1
00526    entry in the dynamic section.  */
00527 #define DF_1_NOW  0x00000001  
00528 #define DF_1_GLOBAL 0x00000002  
00529 #define DF_1_GROUP  0x00000004  
00530 #define DF_1_NODELETE 0x00000008  
00531 #define DF_1_LOADFLTR 0x00000010  
00532 #define DF_1_INITFIRST  0x00000020  
00533 #define DF_1_NOOPEN 0x00000040  
00534 #define DF_1_ORIGIN 0x00000080  
00535 #define DF_1_DIRECT 0x00000100  
00536 #define DF_1_TRANS  0x00000200
00537 #define DF_1_INTERPOSE  0x00000400  
00538 #define DF_1_NODEFLIB 0x00000800  
00539 #define DF_1_NODUMP 0x00001000  
00540 #define DF_1_CONFALT  0x00002000  
00541 #define DF_1_ENDFILTEE  0x00004000  
00542 #define DF_1_DISPRELDNE 0x00008000  
00543 #define DF_1_DISPRELPND 0x00010000  
00545 /* Flags for the feature selection in DT_FEATURE_1.  */
00546 #define DTF_1_PARINIT 0x00000001
00547 #define DTF_1_CONFEXP 0x00000002
00548 
00549 /* Flags in the DT_POSFLAG_1 entry effecting only the next DT_* entry.  */
00550 #define DF_P1_LAZYLOAD  0x00000001  
00551 #define DF_P1_GROUPPERM 0x00000002

00572 typedef struct {
00573     Elf64_Addr    r_offset;

00577 
00578 #define ELF32_R_SYM(i)    ((i)>>8)
00579 #define ELF32_R_TYPE(i)   ((unsigned char)(i))
00580 #define ELF32_R_INFO(s,t) (((s)<<8)+(unsigned char)(t))
00581 
00582 #define ELF64_R_SYM(i)    ((i)>>32)
00583 #define ELF64_R_TYPE(i)   ((i)&0xffffffffL)
00584 #define ELF64_R_INFO(s,t) (((s)<<32)+(t)&0xffffffffL)
00585 
00586 /* Relocation types (processor specific) - page 1-23, figure 1-22 */
00587 
00588 #define R_386_NONE  0 
00589 #define R_386_32  1 
00590 #define R_386_PC32  2 
00591 #define R_386_GOT32 3 
00592 #define R_386_PLT32 4 
00593 #define R_386_COPY  5 
00594 #define R_386_GLOB_DAT  6 
00595 #define R_386_JMP_SLOT  7 
00596 #define R_386_RELATIVE  8 
00597 #define R_386_GOTOFF  9 
00598 #define R_386_GOTPC 10  
00599 #define R_386_32PLT    11
00600 #define R_386_TLS_TPOFF    14   /* Offset in static TLS block */
00601 #define R_386_TLS_IE     15   /* Address of GOT entry for static TLS
00602              block offset */
00603 #define R_386_TLS_GOTIE    16   /* GOT entry for static TLS block
00604              offset */
00605 #define R_386_TLS_LE     17   /* Offset relative to static TLS
00606              block */
00607 #define R_386_TLS_GD     18   /* Direct 32 bit for GNU version of
00608              general dynamic thread local data */
00609 #define R_386_TLS_LDM    19   /* Direct 32 bit for GNU version of
00610              local dynamic thread local data
00611              in LE code */
00612 #define R_386_16     20
00613 #define R_386_PC16     21
00614 #define R_386_8      22
00615 #define R_386_PC8    23
00616 #define R_386_TLS_GD_32    24   /* Direct 32 bit for general dynamic
00617              thread local data */
00618 #define R_386_TLS_GD_PUSH  25   /* Tag for pushl in GD TLS code */
00619 #define R_386_TLS_GD_CALL  26   /* Relocation for call to
00620              __tls_get_addr() */
00621 #define R_386_TLS_GD_POP   27   /* Tag for popl in GD TLS code */
00622 #define R_386_TLS_LDM_32   28   /* Direct 32 bit for local dynamic
00623              thread local data in LE code */
00624 #define R_386_TLS_LDM_PUSH 29   /* Tag for pushl in LDM TLS code */
00625 #define R_386_TLS_LDM_CALL 30   /* Relocation for call to
00626              __tls_get_addr() in LDM code */
00627 #define R_386_TLS_LDM_POP  31   /* Tag for popl in LDM TLS code */
00628 #define R_386_TLS_LDO_32   32   /* Offset relative to TLS block */
00629 #define R_386_TLS_IE_32    33   /* GOT entry for negated static TLS
00630              block offset */
00631 #define R_386_TLS_LE_32    34   /* Negated offset relative to static
00632              TLS block */
00633 #define R_386_TLS_DTPMOD32 35   /* ID of module containing symbol */
00634 #define R_386_TLS_DTPOFF32 36   /* Offset in TLS block */
00635 #define R_386_TLS_TPOFF32  37   /* Negated offset in static TLS block */
00636 /* Keep this the last entry.  */
00637 #define R_386_NUM    38
00638 
00639 /* ARM specific declarations */
00640 
00641 /* Processor specific flags for the ELF header e_flags field.  */
00642 #define EF_ARM_RELEXEC     0x01
00643 #define EF_ARM_HASENTRY    0x02
00644 #define EF_ARM_INTERWORK   0x04
00645 #define EF_ARM_APCS_26     0x08
00646 #define EF_ARM_APCS_FLOAT  0x10
00647 #define EF_ARM_PIC         0x20
00648 #define EF_ARM_ALIGN8      0x40   /* 8-bit structure alignment is in use */
00649 #define EF_ARM_NEW_ABI     0x80
00650 #define EF_ARM_OLD_ABI     0x100
00651 
00652 /* Other constants defined in the ARM ELF spec. version B-01.  */
00653 /* NB. These conflict with values defined above.  */
00654 #define EF_ARM_SYMSARESORTED  0x04
00655 #define EF_ARM_DYNSYMSUSESEGIDX 0x08
00656 #define EF_ARM_MAPSYMSFIRST 0x10
00657 #define EF_ARM_EABIMASK   0XFF000000
00658 
00659 #define EF_ARM_EABI_VERSION(flags) ((flags) & EF_ARM_EABIMASK)
00660 #define EF_ARM_EABI_UNKNOWN  0x00000000
00661 #define EF_ARM_EABI_VER1     0x01000000
00662 #define EF_ARM_EABI_VER2     0x02000000
00663 
00664 /* Additional symbol types for Thumb */
00665 #define STT_ARM_TFUNC      0xd
00666 
00667 /* ARM-specific values for sh_flags */
00668 #define SHF_ARM_ENTRYSECT  0x10000000   /* Section contains an entry point */
00669 #define SHF_ARM_COMDEF     0x80000000   /* Section may be multiply defined
00670              in the input to a link step */
00671 
00672 /* ARM-specific program header flags */
00673 #define PF_ARM_SB          0x10000000   /* Segment contains the location
00674              addressed by the static base */
00675 
00676 /* ARM relocs.  */
00677 #define R_ARM_NONE    0 /* No reloc */
00678 #define R_ARM_PC24    1 /* PC relative 26 bit branch */
00679 #define R_ARM_ABS32   2 /* Direct 32 bit  */
00680 #define R_ARM_REL32   3 /* PC relative 32 bit */
00681 #define R_ARM_PC13    4
00682 #define R_ARM_ABS16   5 /* Direct 16 bit */
00683 #define R_ARM_ABS12   6 /* Direct 12 bit */
00684 #define R_ARM_THM_ABS5    7
00685 #define R_ARM_ABS8    8 /* Direct 8 bit */
00686 #define R_ARM_SBREL32   9
00687 #define R_ARM_THM_PC22    10
00688 #define R_ARM_THM_PC8   11
00689 #define R_ARM_AMP_VCALL9  12
00690 #define R_ARM_SWI24   13
00691 #define R_ARM_THM_SWI8    14
00692 #define R_ARM_XPC25   15
00693 #define R_ARM_THM_XPC22   16
00694 #define R_ARM_COPY    20  /* Copy symbol at runtime */
00695 #define R_ARM_GLOB_DAT    21  /* Create GOT entry */
00696 #define R_ARM_JUMP_SLOT   22  /* Create PLT entry */
00697 #define R_ARM_RELATIVE    23  /* Adjust by program base */
00698 #define R_ARM_GOTOFF    24  /* 32 bit offset to GOT */
00699 #define R_ARM_GOTPC   25  /* 32 bit PC relative offset to GOT */
00700 #define R_ARM_GOT32   26  /* 32 bit GOT entry */
00701 #define R_ARM_PLT32   27  /* 32 bit PLT address */
00702 #define R_ARM_ALU_PCREL_7_0 32
00703 #define R_ARM_ALU_PCREL_15_8  33
00704 #define R_ARM_ALU_PCREL_23_15 34
00705 #define R_ARM_LDR_SBREL_11_0  35
00706 #define R_ARM_ALU_SBREL_19_12 36
00707 #define R_ARM_ALU_SBREL_27_20 37
00708 #define R_ARM_GNU_VTENTRY 100
00709 #define R_ARM_GNU_VTINHERIT 101
00710 #define R_ARM_THM_PC11    102 /* thumb unconditional branch */
00711 #define R_ARM_THM_PC9   103 /* thumb conditional branch */
00712 #define R_ARM_RXPC25    249
00713 #define R_ARM_RSBREL32    250
00714 #define R_ARM_THM_RPC22   251
00715 #define R_ARM_RREL32    252
00716 #define R_ARM_RABS22    253
00717 #define R_ARM_RPC24   254
00718 #define R_ARM_RBASE   255
00719 /* Keep this the last entry.  */
00720 #define R_ARM_NUM   256
00721 
00722 /* AMD x86-64 relocations.  */
00723 #define R_X86_64_NONE   0 /* No reloc */
00724 #define R_X86_64_64   1 /* Direct 64 bit  */
00725 #define R_X86_64_PC32   2 /* PC relative 32 bit signed */
00726 #define R_X86_64_GOT32    3 /* 32 bit GOT entry */
00727 #define R_X86_64_PLT32    4 /* 32 bit PLT address */
00728 #define R_X86_64_COPY   5 /* Copy symbol at runtime */
00729 #define R_X86_64_GLOB_DAT 6 /* Create GOT entry */
00730 #define R_X86_64_JUMP_SLOT  7 /* Create PLT entry */
00731 #define R_X86_64_RELATIVE 8 /* Adjust by program base */
00732 #define R_X86_64_GOTPCREL 9 /* 32 bit signed PC relative
00733              offset to GOT */
00734 #define R_X86_64_32   10  /* Direct 32 bit zero extended */
00735 #define R_X86_64_32S    11  /* Direct 32 bit sign extended */
00736 #define R_X86_64_16   12  /* Direct 16 bit zero extended */
00737 #define R_X86_64_PC16   13  /* 16 bit sign extended pc relative */
00738 #define R_X86_64_8    14  /* Direct 8 bit sign extended  */
00739 #define R_X86_64_PC8    15  /* 8 bit sign extended pc relative */
00740 #define R_X86_64_DTPMOD64 16  /* ID of module containing symbol */
00741 #define R_X86_64_DTPOFF64 17  /* Offset in module's TLS block */
00742 #define R_X86_64_TPOFF64  18  /* Offset in initial TLS block */
00743 #define R_X86_64_TLSGD    19  /* 32 bit signed PC relative offset
00744              to two GOT entries for GD symbol */
00745 #define R_X86_64_TLSLD    20  /* 32 bit signed PC relative offset
00746              to two GOT entries for LD symbol */
00747 #define R_X86_64_DTPOFF32 21  /* Offset in TLS block */
00748 #define R_X86_64_GOTTPOFF 22  /* 32 bit signed PC relative offset
00749              to GOT entry for IE symbol */
00750 #define R_X86_64_TPOFF32  23  /* Offset in initial TLS block */
00751 
00752 #define R_X86_64_NUM    24
00753 
00754 /* Symbol Table Entry - page 1-17, figure 1-16 */
00755 
00756 #define STN_UNDEF 0
00757 
00759 typedef struct {
00760     Elf32_Word    st_name;  
00761     Elf32_Addr    st_value; 
00762     Elf32_Word    st_size;  
00763     unsigned char st_info;  
00764     unsigned char st_other; 
00765     Elf32_Half    st_shndx; 
00766 } Elf32_Sym;
00767 
00769 typedef struct {
00770     Elf64_Word    st_name;  
00771     unsigned char st_info;  
00772     unsigned char st_other; 
00773     Elf64_Half    st_shndx; 
00774     Elf64_Addr    st_value; 
00775     Elf64_Xword   st_size;  
00776 } Elf64_Sym;
00777 
00778 #define ELF32_ST_BIND(i)    ((i)>>4)
00779 #define ELF32_ST_TYPE(i)    ((i)&0xf)
00780 #define ELF32_ST_INFO(b,t)  (((b)<<4)+((t)&0xf))
00781 
00782 #define ELF64_ST_BIND(i)    ((i)>>4)
00783 #define ELF64_ST_TYPE(i)    ((i)&0xf)
00784 #define ELF64_ST_INFO(b,t)  (((b)<<4)+((t)&0xf))
00785 
00786 /* Symbol Binding - page 1-18, figure 1-17 */
00787 
00788 #define STB_LOCAL 0 
00789 #define STB_GLOBAL  1 
00790 #define STB_WEAK  2 
00791 #define STB_LOOS  10  
00792 #define STB_HIOS  12  
00793 #define STB_LOPROC  13  
00794 #define STB_HIPROC  15  
00796 /* Symbol Types - page 1-19, figure 1-18 */
00797 
00798 #define STT_NOTYPE  0 
00799 #define STT_OBJECT  1 
00800 #define STT_FUNC  2 
00801 #define STT_SECTION 3 
00802 #define STT_FILE  4 
00803 #define STT_LOOS  10  
00804 #define STT_HIOS  12  
00805 #define STT_LOPROC  13  
00806 #define STT_HIPROC  15  
00808 enum Elf_ATs
00809 {
00810   AT_NULL        = 0,
00811   AT_IGNORE      = 1,
00812   AT_EXECFD      = 2,
00813   AT_PHDR        = 3,
00814   AT_PHENT       = 4,
00815   AT_PHNUM       = 5,
00816   AT_PAGESZ      = 6,
00817   AT_BASE        = 7,
00818   AT_FLAGS       = 8,
00819   AT_ENTRY       = 9,
00820   AT_NOTELF      = 10,
00821   AT_UID         = 11,
00822   AT_EUID        = 12,
00823   AT_GID         = 13,
00824   AT_EGID        = 14,
00825 
00826   AT_L4_AUX      = 0xf0,
00827   AT_L4_ENV      = 0xf1,
00828 };
00829 
00830 typedef struct Elf32_Auxv
00831 {
00832   Elf32_Word atype;
00833   Elf32_Word avalue;
00834 } Elf32_Auxv;
00835 
00836 typedef struct Elf64_Auxv
00837 {
00838   Elf64_Word atype;
00839   Elf64_Word avalue;
00840 } Elf64_Auxv;
00841 
00842 /* Some helpers */
00843 static inline int l4util_elf_check_magic(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr);
00844 static inline int l4util_elf_check_arch(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr);
00845 static inline ElfW(Phdr) *l4util_elf_phdr(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr);
00846 
00847 
00848 /* Implemeantions */
00849 static inline
00850 int l4util_elf_check_magic(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr)
00851 {
00852   return    hdr->e_ident[EI_MAG0] == ELFMAG0
00853          && hdr->e_ident[EI_MAG1] == ELFMAG1
00854          && hdr->e_ident[EI_MAG2] == ELFMAG2
00855          && hdr->e_ident[EI_MAG3] == ELFMAG3;
00856 }
00857 
00858 static inline
00859 int l4util_elf_check_arch(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr)
00860 {
00861   return    hdr->e_ident[EI_CLASS] == L4_ARCH_EI_CLASS
00862          && hdr->e_ident[EI_DATA]  == L4_ARCH_EI_DATA
00863          && hdr->e_machine         == L4_ARCH_E_MACHINE;
00864 }
00865 
00866 static inline
00867 ElfW(Phdr) *l4util_elf_phdr(ElfW(Ehdr) *hdr)
00868 {
00869   return (ElfW(Phdr) *)((char *)hdr + hdr->e_phoff);
00870 }
00873 #endif /* _L4_EXEC_ELF_H */
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
